setupGuideDescription: Follow these steps to configure your database and email service for production use.
createSupabaseProjectDescription: Go to supabase.com and create a new project. Copy the connection string from Settings > Database.
createPlanetScaleDBDescription: Go to planetscale.com and create a new database. Get the connection string from your dashboard.
planetScaleNote: PlanetScale uses Vitess which doesn't support foreign keys. Use relationMode = "prisma" in your schema.
emailSetupDescription: Configure an email service to send verification and password reset emails.
consoleEmailWarning: Console mode is for development only. Emails will be logged to the console instead of being sent.
consoleEmailDescription: No additional setup required. Email content will appear in your server console.
i18nSetupDescription: Add support for multiple languages in your application.
addTranslationsDescription: Create JSON files for each language in the locales directory.
updateConfigDescription: Add your new locale to the supported locales array in the config file.
